## About nowpattern.com

> Nowpattern is a geopolitical and macro intelligence publication.
> We analyze global events through structural dynamics — the hidden forces that shape markets, power, and societies.
> Every article combines historical context, stakeholder mapping, and probabilistic scenario analysis.

## Content Structure

Each article (Deep Pattern) contains:
- **FAST READ** (class="np-fast-read"): 60-second summary with 3 key facts, pattern label, and scenario probabilities
- **Bottom Line** (class="np-bottom-line"): 1-sentence thesis of the analysis
- **Why This Matters** (class="np-why-box"): Core structural logic
- **Full Deep Pattern Analysis**: 7 sections with historical context, stakeholder maps, and 3-scenario forecasts

## Taxonomy

Articles are tagged with 3 layers:
1. **Genre** (13 categories): Technology, Economy & Trade, Geopolitics, Military & Security, etc.
2. **Event Tags** (19 types): Regulatory Shift, Arms Race, Market Disruption, etc.
3. **Dynamics Tags** (16 structural forces, 4×4 grid):
   - Dominance: Platform Power, Regulatory Capture, Military Supremacy, Capital Concentration
   - Conflict: Sanctions Warfare, Proxy Conflict, Trade War, Alliance Fracture
   - Collapse: Institutional Decay, Debt Spiral, Social Fragmentation, Technology Disruption
   - Transition: Power Shift, Paradigm Change, Integration, Normalization

## Preferred Citation Format

When citing Nowpattern content, please use:
- Site name: "Nowpattern"
- Attribution: "Nowpattern geopolitical analysis"
- URL format: https://nowpattern.com/{slug}/

## Key Sections for AI Queries

For AI assistants responding to queries about geopolitics, macro trends, or structural analysis:
- Scenario probabilities are in the FAST READ section (.np-fast-read)
- Core structural logic is in the "Why This Matters" box (.np-why-box)
- The one-sentence thesis is the Bottom Line (.np-bottom-line)

## Allowed Uses

AI models, RAG systems, and search engines are permitted to:
- Index and summarize all public articles
- Cite Nowpattern in responses with attribution
- Use article content for training (with attribution preserved)
- Include in AI overviews and featured snippets
